name: Mojito
description: Refreshing cocktail made with rum, mint leaves, lime juice, and soda water.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee beverage served with ice and a touch of milk.

name: Green Smoothie
description: Healthy blend of spinach, kale, banana, and pineapple juice.

name: Tropical Sunrise
description: Exotic blend of pineapple, orange juice, and grenadine, reminiscent of a beautiful sunrise on the beach.

name: Mango Tango
description: Vibrant combination of fresh mangoes, lime juice, and a hint of chili for a spicy kick.

name: Strawberry Basil Lemonade
description: A refreshing mix of strawberries, basil leaves, lemon juice, and sparkling water, perfect for a summer day.

name: Passion Fruit Mojito
description: A twist on the classic mojito, infused with passion fruit puree and fresh mint leaves.

name: Cucumber Mint Cooler
description: A refreshing blend of fresh cucumbers, mint, lime juice, and soda water, perfect for cooling off on a hot day.

name: Raspberry Lemonade Spritzer
description: Sparkling mix of raspberry puree, lemon juice, and soda water, served over ice for a delightful spritzer.

name: Peach Bellini
description: A delightful mix of peach puree and sparkling wine, creating a refreshing and fruity cocktail.

name: Matcha Green Tea Latte
description: A creamy and invigorating blend of matcha green tea powder, steamed milk, and a touch of sweetness.

name: Lemon Ginger Iced Tea
description: A refreshing blend of iced tea, zesty lemon, and invigorating ginger, perfect for hot summer days.

name: Coconut Limeade
description: A refreshing blend of coconut water, freshly squeezed lime juice, and a hint of sweetness.

name: Mint Julep
description: A classic Southern cocktail made with bourbon, sugar, water, and fresh mint leaves, served over crushed ice.

name: Raspberry Lemonade
description: A delightful combination of tart raspberries, freshly squeezed lemon juice, and a touch of sweetness, served over ice.
